name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: High-quality wireless Bluetooth headphones with noise-cancellation and 20 hours of battery life.

name: Eco-Friendly Water Bottle
description: Durable and reusable water bottle made from eco-friendly materials. BPA-free and easy to carry.

name: Smart LED Desk Lamp
description: Smart desk lamp with adjustable brightness, color temperature settings, and USB charging port.

name: Men's Running Shoes
description: Lightweight and comfortable running shoes with superior cushioning and durable soles.

name: Ceramic Coffee Mug
description: Stylish ceramic coffee mug with 350ml capacity, perfect for your morning coffee or tea.

name: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo
description: Compact and lightweight wireless keyboard and mouse set with long battery life and ergonomic design.

name: Kids' Educational Puzzle Set
description: Fun and educational puzzle set designed for kids aged 4-10. Enhances problem-solving skills.

name: Portable Power Bank 10000mAh
description: Compact and lightweight power bank with 10000mAh capacity. Supports fast charging for multiple devices.

name: Luxury Scented Candle
description: Hand-poured scented candle with a calming lavender aroma. Burns for up to 40 hours.

name: Adjustable Laptop Stand
description: Ergonomic laptop stand with adjustable height and angle. Supports laptops up to 15.6 inches.
